participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: curious and imaginative, she enjoys creating stories with her dolls.
participant_1.background: i have a pet turtle. i like to play with my dolls. i don't pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: energetic and playful, he loves adventures and singing.
participant_2.background: i'm in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground.
